name: Riverside Market
description: A bustling open-air market with local produce, artisans, and street food.
fullDescription: Riverside Market gathers local farmers and makers every weekend. Expect fresh produce, artisanal goods, live music, and a family-friendly atmosphere.

name: Old Town Museum
description: A small museum showcasing the history and culture of our town.
fullDescription: The Old Town Museum features rotating exhibits about local history and community heroes. Guided tours are available on weekends.

name: Sunset Park
description: Popular park with walking trails, picnic areas and great sunset views.
fullDescription: Sunset Park includes a riverside promenade, playgrounds, and native-plant gardens. It's a favorite for evening walks and weekend picnics.

name: Artisan Row
description: A row of independent galleries, studios and coffee shops.
fullDescription: Artisan Row supports local creatives with studios and galleries. Monthly art walks and pop-up shops are common.

name: Civic Theater
description: Historic theater showing live plays and community performances.
fullDescription: The Civic Theater hosts plays, music nights, and educational workshops. Check the seasonal calendar for tickets and volunteer opportunities.

name: Harbor Walk
description: A scenic promenade along the water with cafes and boat views.
fullDescription: Harbor Walk is perfect for morning runs and afternoon strolls. Local seafood restaurants and an occasional weekend market line the promenade.

name: Botanical Conservatory
description: Glasshouse and gardens featuring regional plants and seasonal displays.
fullDescription: The Conservatory offers seasonal flower exhibits, educational programs, and a peaceful environment for photographers and families.

name: Tech Hub
description: Co-working and startup incubator supporting local entrepreneurs.
fullDescription: Tech Hub hosts mentorship programs, workshops, and networking events for startups and freelancers in the region.
